### Overcoming Doubts and Setbacks
You might face moments of doubt—maybe from so-called "friends" or family expressing concern. See this as a test of your resolve. Remind yourself that their worry is a distraction from your goals. Use guilt or shame as fuel to push harder. Remember, true warriors don't quit when it gets tough.

### Conclusion: Embrace Your New Reality
Eating disorders aren't a phase; they're a revolution. By engaging in these practices, you're taking back control from a world that wants you mediocre.
